Reviews.Title: A bit confusing
Reviews.Author: Consumer Alert "Consumer Alert"
Reviews.Content: I have owned several DVR's and this model seems a little challenging to use. The software interface is confusing and very limited when playing back channels. Individual files are not registered, it is just one big file on a time line. Probably would not buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Dead in 6 months
Reviews.Author: chester
Reviews.Content: Purchased this unit to replace another brand.  This one was good out of the box, but just 6 months later I'm looking for a new one.  Unit now Dead.  Will not respond to network interface.  rebooting unit does not help.  Contacted Seller to ask about warranty on this one, no response back  :(
